jdbcService.sql: select * from ~nodes n join ~group_roles gr on gr.node_id = n.id join ~actions a on gr.role_id = ar.role_id join ~action_roles ar on ar.action_id = a.id join ~user_groups ug on ug.group_id = gr.group_id where a.name = 'user.manage' and ug.user_id = any(:userIds) and (:componentId is null or n.component_id = any(:componentId))
